Title: Indru Netru Naalai
Actors: Vishnu Vishal, Mia George, Karunakaran, V. Jayaprakash
Plot: Elango and his friend Pulivetti Arumugam come in possession of a time machine and start profiting from it. However, their meddling with time prevents the death of a gangster, who begins to wreck havoc in their lives.
